column4: hi people! I tried to install ZendStudio and Zend Server CE on ubuntu. Now I am running Studio and Server seem's to be installed. but I and Studio can  not create any dir or file on www root directory with this error: "Parent of resource: /var/www/index.html is marked as read-only./var/www/index.html (Permission denied)"
gksudo to launch your studio app might do it
all your debs are cached in /var/cache/apt/archives if you are curious to see what's there
so if the deb is still there, and still current, the next time you install the package Ubuntu will not get it from the net, but from the cache locally
that's because you still had the config from last time (probably in ~/.someapp-config
It is  zend server wrapper for phpMyAdmin, I dont know where it is installed?
neither do I, sorry.
you can use "apt-get purge somepackage" instead of apt-get remove , to remove config
that should offer the config wizard next time you install it.
without removing its .deb from chache?
correct
you never have to touch that cache. you can clear it if you want to save drive space for some reason. apt-get clean, apt-get autoclean  are different ways to clean it, look at the docs for details.
remove the card and then start.
what?! without any vga?!
with the onboard vga on the motherboard
my board have not it.
then how were you using the computer before?
I had a geforce card, now I buy an ATI.
knowing what ATI card would be extremely helpful :)
ATI Radeon HD 5450
denight a person in this channel (named ruan) said that I must regenerate something! he asked me if I have access to terminal and showed me: sudo mv /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.bak
there he is!
thank you very much!
